summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of CT Fidelis landing page updates. All major requirements successfully implemented and working correctly.
passed_tests: Carousel shows central card (70% width) + preview of next card
Cards have rounded corners (rounded-2xl class applied)
William's photo correctly sized on mobile (max-h-350px, max-w-280px)
Navigation arrows successfully removed from carousel
Dot indicators (6 total) functional and clickable
Split button animation working (is-clicked class applied on click)
WhatsApp links functional with correct phone number (553199490457)
Instagram links functional with correct username (@equipefidelistkd)
Mobile responsive design working at 375px viewport
Carousel preview effect working (2 slides visible: main + preview)
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes
